Committee: Veterans, Homeland Security And Military Affairs

Milestones.Committee: Veterans, Homeland Security And Military Affairs

Actions.Text: REFERRED TO VETERANS, HOMELAND SECURITY AND MILITARY AFFAIRS

Title: Relates to disabled veterans a municipality may exempt from certain taxation
Summary: Authorizes counties, cities, towns, villages and school districts to exempt disabled veterans rated as such by the US Department of Veterans affairs from certain property taxes.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property tax law, in relation to disabled veterans a municipality may exempt from certain taxation
